tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_production (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    production_date DATE,
    production_time TIME,
    energy_source VARCHAR(50),
    energy_output DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE solar_panels (
    panel_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity FLOAT,
    efficiency FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE wind_turbines (
    turbine_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    height FLOAT,
    rotor_diameter FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE energy_production (
    production_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    source VARCHAR(255),
    production_date DATE,
    amount FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE SolarPanels (
    panel_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location TEXT,
    capacity INT,
    efficiency FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE WindTurbines (
    turbine_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location TEXT,
    rotor_diameter FLOAT,
    height FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyProduction (
    production_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    energy_source TEXT,
    production_date DATE,
    energy_produced FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
    consumption_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    consumption_date DATE,
    energy_consumed FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE SolarPanels (
    panel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    efficiency FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE WindTurbines (
    turbine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    blade_length FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyProduction (
    production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_type VARCHAR(50),
    energy_amount FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
    consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    device_id INT,
    energy_amount FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE EnergySelfSufficiency (
    calculation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    self_sufficiency_rate FLOAT
)
